SEARCH
Package fr.esiee.baba.model

Class Transmutation

java.lang.Object
fr.esiee.baba.model.Transmutation
public class Transmutation extends Object
Manages the dynamic effects of rule interactions within the game level, such as melting, defeat, and transformations. This class applies the rules as defined in the current game state to alter the state of the grid elements accordingly.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Transmutation(Level level, Rules rules)
    Constructs a Transmutation object that manages rule-based transformations within a game level.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transmutation

      public Transmutation(Level level, Rules rules)
      Constructs a Transmutation object that manages rule-based transformations within a game level.
      Parameters:
      level - the current game level where transformations will be applied.
      rules - the set of rules that dictate how elements interact and transform.

  • Method Details

    • checkMelt

      public void checkMelt()
      Applies the melt rule across the game grid. Elements with the MELT property are removed if they share a cell with elements having the HOT property.

    • checkDefeat

      public void checkDefeat()
      Applies the defeat rule across the game grid. Elements with the YOU property are removed if they share a cell with elements having the DEFEAT property.

    • checkSink

      public void checkSink()
      Applies the sink rule across the game grid. Both the element with the SINK property and any other element in the same cell are removed.

    • applyTransformation

      public void applyTransformation(Noun source, Noun dest)
      Transforms all entities of the specified source type to the destination type within the entire grid. This method is called to enact transformation rules such as "BABA IS ROCK".
      Parameters:
      source - the noun representing the original type of entity.
      dest - the noun representing the new type of entity after transformation.

    • setTransmutation

      public void setTransmutation(Level level, Rules rules)
      Sets or updates the level and rules associated with this Transmutation.
      Parameters:
      level - the new level to be used for transformations.
      rules - the new set of rules to apply for element interactions.
